data.title: Laurent Macquet on LinkedIn: Cloud Roadmap Series: AI Innovation 7
data.meta_description:
Cloud Roadmap Series: AI Innovation 7/23 at 10:00 am PDT 
Unlock Innovation with Vertex AI!
Join our product management leadership for an invitation-onlyâ€¦
data.text:
Understanding the Cost of LLMs With the rise of Generative AI, businesses are increasingly curious about leveraging AI to answer critical questions: Where should I invest? How is my business growing? What insights can I gain from specific markets? Imagine having an agent that knows everything about your companyâ€”a.k.a. a chatbot. As your business grows, it's crucial to understand the financial implications of every investment, including the creation of a chatbot. In our next episode, we'll break down the costs associated with deploying and implementing a Large Language Model (LLM) for your company. We'll cover techniques to optimize costs, cloud hosting expenses, pay-by-token models, and even the considerations for hosting your own model. Episode 3: How Much Does an LLM Cost for My Company?

Dive into the future of tech with 'Beyond Boundaries: Generative AI and Machine Learning with Hitachi Hybrid Cloud'. From recent Private Equity meetings I know that Gen AI is a game changer for both PE Firms and how they look to drive Value Creation with their portfolio companies. Join AI experts, Jason Hardy and David A. Chapa as they unveil the impact of #GenAI, the key players, and strategies for implementation. https://ow.ly/v5cR30sATQ2
